content.text:
# Draft:Emperor London

Emperor London is a British-established streetwear brand founded in 2008 by the Golkar Brothers—Babak, Farhan, and Haman. The brand offers clothing, footwear, accessories, and fragrances at an accessible price point. It is known for its tailored cuts and contemporary streetwear designs, with a presence in the Middle East through retailers such as Splash Fashions and Centrepoint.
History
Emperor London was founded in London, England, in 2008 by the Golkar Brothers. The brand positions itself as a lifestyle streetwear label, combining modern design with accessible pricing.
Since its inception, the brand has expanded its product offerings to include clothing, accessories, and fragrances, targeting a style-conscious audience seeking quality and contemporary fashion.
Products
* Clothing: T-shirts, shirts, sweaters, jackets, and trousers
* Accessories: Hats and other accessories
* Fragrances: A selection of fragrances is also part of the brand’s portfolio.
Brand identity
* Category: Lifestyle streetwear
* Price point: Accessible
* Founders: Babak, Farhan, and Haman Golkar
* Establishment: 2008
* Origin: London, England
Retail presence
Emperor London products are available in the Middle East at retailers including Splash Fashions and Centrepoint.
Awards and recognition
In 2018, Emperor London won the regional menswear round of the International Woolmark Prize, highlighting the brand's design and innovation in the Middle East.
External links
* [https://emperorlondon.com Official website]
